summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Scio Verum Corporation for the period of November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013. It details the account balance, transactions including deposits and withdrawals, and service charges incurred during the statement period.

persons.name: Helene Tolentino
persons.context: Helene Tolentino is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account holder, providing contact information for commercial client services.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Scio Verum Corporation.
The statement period is from November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013.
The beginning balance was $41,666.67 and the ending balance was $33,324.21.
A total of $50,026.50 was transferred out of the account on November 27, 2013.
Service charges were incurred, including a $26.50 service charge on November 13, 2013.
